title: Transitioning household when roommate moves out
description: Transitioning household when roommate moves out
content:
Scenario: Transitioning household when roommate moves out
    Given Aisha's roommate is moving out
    And household responsibilities need redistribution
    When the household composition changes
    Then the household_elohim should help manage the transition
    And it should recalculate resource allocations
    And it should settle care token balances fairly
    And it should help Aisha adjust to changed circumstances
    And household transitions should be supported systematically
